org.apache.taverna.server.localworker.impl

Class LocalWorker

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • org.apache.taverna.server.localworker.impl.LocalWorker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Remote, RemoteSingleRun

    public class LocalWorker
extends UnicastRemoteObject
implements RemoteSingleRun
    This class implements one side of the connection between the Taverna Server master server and this process. It delegates to a Worker instance the handling of actually running a workflow.
    Author:
    Donal Fellows
    See Also:
    DirectoryDelegate, FileDelegate, WorkerCore, Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • LocalWorker

        protected LocalWorker(String executeWorkflowCommand,
                      byte[] workflow,
                      UsageRecordReceiver urReceiver,
                      UUID id,
                      Map<String,String> seedEnvironment,
                      List<String> javaParams,
                      WorkerFactory workerFactory)
               throws RemoteException,
                      ImplementationException
        Parameters:
        executeWorkflowCommand - The script used to execute workflows.
        workflow - The workflow to execute.
        workerClass - The class to instantiate as our local representative of the run.
        urReceiver - The remote class to report the generated usage record(s) to.
        id - The UUID to use, or null if we are to invent one.
        seedEnvironment - The key/value pairs to seed the worker subprocess environment with.
        javaParams - Parameters to pass to the worker subprocess java runtime itself.
        workerFactory - How to make instances of the low-level worker objects.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - If registration of the worker fails.
        ImplementationException - If something goes wrong during local setup.

      • makeListener

        public RemoteListener makeListener(String type,
                                   String configuration)
                            throws RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: RemoteSingleRun
        Create a listener that can be attached to this run.
        Specified by:
        makeListener in interface RemoteSingleRun
        Parameters:
        type - The type name of the listener to create; it must be one of the names returned by the RemoteSingleRun.getListenerTypes() operation.
        configuration - The configuration document for this listener. The nature of the contents of this are determined by the type.
        Returns:
        A handle for the listener.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - If anything goes wrong with the communication.

      • setInputBaclavaFile

        public void setInputBaclavaFile(String filename)
                         throws RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: RemoteSingleRun
        Sets the Baclava file to use for all inputs. This overrides the use of individual inputs.
        Specified by:
        setInputBaclavaFile in interface RemoteSingleRun
        Parameters:
        filename - The filename to use. Must not start with a / or contain any .. segments. Will be interpreted relative to the run's working directory.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - If anything goes wrong with the communication.

      • setOutputBaclavaFile

        public void setOutputBaclavaFile(String filename)
                          throws RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: RemoteSingleRun
        Sets where the output of the run is to be written to. This will cause the output to be generated as a Baclava document, rather than a collection of individual non-Baclava files in the subdirectory of the working directory called out.
        Specified by:
        setOutputBaclavaFile in interface RemoteSingleRun
        Parameters:
        filename - Where to write the Baclava file (or null to cause the output to be written to individual files); overwrites any previous setting of this value.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - If anything goes wrong with the communication.

      • setGenerateProvenance

        public void setGenerateProvenance(boolean prov)
        Description copied from interface: RemoteSingleRun
        Sets whether we should generate provenance information from a run.
        Specified by:
        setGenerateProvenance in interface RemoteSingleRun
        Parameters:
        prov - Boolean flag, true for do the generation. Must be set before starting the run for this to have an effect.

      • setStatus

        public void setStatus(RemoteStatus newStatus)
               throws IllegalStateTransitionException,
                      RemoteException,
                      ImplementationException,
                      StillWorkingOnItException
        Description copied from interface: RemoteSingleRun
        Set the status of the run, which should cause it to move into the given state. This may cause some significant changes.
        Specified by:
        setStatus in interface RemoteSingleRun
        Parameters:
        newStatus - The state to try to change to.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateTransitionException - If the requested state change is impossible. (Note that it is always legal to set the status to the current status.)
        RemoteException - If anything goes wrong with the communication.
        ImplementationException - If something goes horribly wrong on the back end.
        StillWorkingOnItException - If the startup time of the workflow implementation exceeds a built-in threshold.

      • getFinishTimestamp

        public Date getFinishTimestamp()
        Specified by:
        getFinishTimestamp in interface RemoteSingleRun
        Returns:
        When this workflow run was found to have finished, or null if it has never finished (either still running or never started).

      • getStartTimestamp

        public Date getStartTimestamp()
        Specified by:
        getStartTimestamp in interface RemoteSingleRun
        Returns:
        When this workflow run was started, or null if it has never been started.

      • setInteractionServiceDetails

        public void setInteractionServiceDetails(URL feed,
                                         URL webdav,
                                         URL publish)
        Description copied from interface: RemoteSingleRun
        Configures the details to use when setting up the workflow run's connnection to the interaction feed.
        Specified by:
        setInteractionServiceDetails in interface RemoteSingleRun
        Parameters:
        feed - The location of the interaction feed. If null, defaults from the factory will be used instead.
        webdav - The location used for pushing web pages to support the feed. If null, a default from the factory will be used instead.
        publish - Where to actually publish to, if this needs to be different from the location presented in the published HTML and Feed entries. Necessary in complex network scenarios.

      • ping

        public void ping()
        Description copied from interface: RemoteSingleRun
        A do-nothing method, used to check the general reachability of the workflow run.
        Specified by:
        ping in interface RemoteSingleRun
